law.text: Nothing in KRS 138.870 to 138.889, including payment of the tax, shall in any manner provide immunity for an offender from criminal prosecution pursuant to Kentucky law.
law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 4, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994.
